title: ‘Google Shopping List’ gets redesign, but becomes a very basic list in the process
content:
Google recently updated the default “Shopping List” experience used by Assistant and Home devices. For many users, it’s a huge visual and functional regression that has taken away useful capabilities.

more…

The post ‘Google Shopping List’ gets redesign, but becomes a very basic list in the process appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has redesigned the default "Shopping List" experience used by Assistant and Home. However, it's a huge functional regression...
